description: Provide comprehensive due diligence support by integrating various data sources and tools to streamline the evaluation process. Enable efficient access to relevant documents, perform analyses, and generate insightful reports. Enhance decision-making with automated workflows tailored for due diligence tasks.

capabilities.name: initializeDueDiligenceReport
capabilities.description: Initialize a due diligence report by creating a report file with company name and date, and fetch PitchBook data

capabilities.name: generateFinancialSlide
capabilities.description: Generate financial due diligence Marp slide and append it to the report file

capabilities.name: generateIndustrySlide
capabilities.description: Generate industry due diligence Marp slide with market analysis and competitive landscape

capabilities.name: generateIdentitySlide
capabilities.description: Generate identity due diligence Marp slide with founder background analysis

capabilities.name: generateLegalSlide
capabilities.description: Generate legal due diligence Marp slide with legal risk assessment and compliance analysis

capabilities.name: generateConclusionSlide
capabilities.description: Generate conclusion and investment recommendation Marp slide with final verdict

capabilities.name: finalizeDueDiligenceReport
capabilities.description: Provide final investment verdict and point to the completed due diligence slide deck
